headline: Microvast and Akamai have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: MVST lands Bull of the Day as revenue surges 43% and profits return, while AKAM's tepid outlook earns it Bear of the Day status.

headline: Bear of the Day: Akamai (AKAM)
summary: Growth has stalled for this key provider of CDN cloud services as investors focus on the AI revolution

headline: 3 Reasons AKAM is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Akamai’s shares have sunk to $78.33, producing a disappointing 18.9% loss while the S&P 500 was flat. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
